name: Octo Waddle
description:
Buy different types of towers to defend your base from the evil geometric shapes!

Earn gold by destroying the shapes to construct more towers, and defeat all levels to win the game. Be careful, after each level ends, you'll lose your current towers, so manage you gold carefully.

Each shape has a different plan of attack! So keep that in mind when placing your towers, you can't be sure what strategies the shapes will use.

Controls:

- WASD/arrows to move

- mouse to use menus and build towers

- esc to skip remaining time of finished wave

This is my first ever game!

I made this game as a kind of JAM game in 3 days, and I learnt a lot! Please tell me what you think!

Feel free to give as most feedback as you wish! I want to learn as much as possible from my first ever game.

I plan on adding levels / enemies / towers and possibly a store system in between levels, I'm open to ideas, this is just my training project.
